subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Tayshaun Prince scored 23 points and Chauncey Billups added 21 last night, and the visiting Detroit Pistons rallied from a 19-point deficit to beat the Chicago Bulls
snippet: Tayshaun Prince scored 23 points and Chauncey Billups added 21 last night, and the visiting Detroit Pistons rallied from a 19-point deficit to beat the Chicago Bulls
